name: Double Knuckles
description: Similar to brass knuckles, but have a tightly wound up system of springs that serve as an immediate second punch to the target of similar force.
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook

name: Deathrifle
description: This rifle uses special grease from Bloodoil to fling its bullets long distances with deadly force. Plumes of smoke whirl out of the chambers during automatic fire, blinding the area with light while also deafening the area with screaming souls. It is very unruly to use and requires both agility and brawn to use to make sure the gun does not point anywhere else than the enemy, as the alchemy seems to have given these rifles quite a mind of their own in terms of aiming.
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook

name: Repeating Dreadrifle
description: It is a rifle operated by a hand crank that winds gears and springs to project bullets at high velocity and distances. The cranks require strength to operate to get the best use out of the heavy and thick rifle. A tripod is recommended to use with the Repeating Dreadrifle.
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook

name: Hand Drake
description: A large, awkward and heavy firearm that can spit fire from a moderate distant. It is created by Alchemy and runs on Arcanite salts and acids. The flames produced are a chemical burn, which water can not put out. If there was still a Christmas, this would on the top of the list for every infantry man.
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook

name: Axe
description: The axe has many forms and specialised uses but generally consists of an axe head with a handle, or helve.
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook

name: Claymore
description: Having a cross hilt of forward-sloping quillons with quatrefoil terminations
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook

name: Dagger
description: With a very sharp point and two or more sharp edges, typically designed or capable of being used as a thrusting or stabbing weapon.
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook

name: Double Shiv
description: Similar to that of the Double Knuckle, the double shiv stabs twice into the target through a very tightly wound up system of springs.
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook

name: Greataxe
description: Long headed and long shafted murder stick.
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook

name: Halberd
description: An axe blade topped with a spike mounted on a long shaft. It always has a hook or thorn on the back side of the axe blade for grappling mounted combatants
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook

name: J'Tunns Sword
description: A gigantic Claymore imitation of the Avatar's titan like sword, where only the physically fit can wield it. It is often nicknamed the "three handed sword".
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook

name: Knife
description: A knife with a blade designed to inflict a lethal injury in a physical confrontation between two or more individuals at very short range (grappling distance).

name: Light Spear
description: A spear is a pole weapon consisting of a shaft, usually of wood, with a pointed head.
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook

name: Long Knife
description: It is just a long-pointed piece of steel, very much like swords seen in the Iron Age.

name: Longsword
description: This can be used either by one hand or two hands.
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook

name: Mace
description: A blunt weapon, a type of club or virge that uses a heavy head on the end of a handle to deliver powerful blows.

name: Magus Mace
description: A rounded spiked ball of metal that is very impressive and forged with care. It is primarily used in the Holy American Empire by its zealots.
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook

name: Pistoned Swordedge
description: Teeth are placed on rails that move up and down at a hurried and ungraceful  pace. The numerous pistons, fueled by oils, vibrate the hilt and the blade to move the teeth along the tiny rails, like a sawblade. This sword is a very lethal sword, but a sword that runs on ammo. It must be primed prior to its use. It is not held like a traditional sword, but has compartments to hold it as Pistons vibrate and jostle the sword. It is like a chain-saw, but terribly engineered and bizarre â€“ but it gets the job done.
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook

name: Rapier
description: With such design features, the rapier is optimized to be a thrusting weapon.
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook

name: Royal Rapier
description: A very beautiful and ornate sword used by the Kingdom of Quebec.
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook and the Duelist Cross Guard attachment on page 207.

name: Sabre
description: a straight single-edged blade and a hilt with a single-handed grip.
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook

name: Shield
description: Held in the hand or mounted on the wrist or forearm
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook

name: Confederate Hand Cannon
description: A dual barrel thick shotgun that fires out a wide blast of shrapnel with thick pluming smoke after the blast.
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook and the Hair Trigger attachment on page 207.

name: Flintlock Pistol
description: Uses a flint striking ignition mechanism.
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook

name: Hand cannon
description: The most mechanically simplistic form of metal barrel firearms.
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook

name: Hand Spring Crossbow
description: A lightweight cross bow that is spring and rubber band operated. It is very easy to break, but easy to manufacture. This is a staple of criminals and thugs alike.
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook

name: Manarok Grenade
description: A device containing angry and imprisoned elemental spirits. In order to use this, attackers must prime the device by pushing a series of buttons that shock and irritate the spirits. When struck, the device will shatter with the spirit's anger releasing in a deadly explosion.
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook

name: Mini Springslugger
description: The widely popular cousin of the Springslug, it is easier to aim but has shorter range and damage.

name: Springslug
description: A lightweight pistol with a good range that is common on the battlefield, used  by officers. The thing is hard to aim and is largely unreliable due to the inner  mechanisms of gears, bolt actions and springs.
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook

name: Blunderbuss
description: A very capable and common weapon that will shoot anything, granted if it is small enough, out of its barrel. It is a very crude, and loud, shotgun. Discharges create thick puffs of smoke that leaves a greasy residue.
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook

name: Bow
description: Ranged weapon system consisting of an elastic launching device (bow) and long-shafted projectiles (arrows).
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook

name: Crossbow
description: A crossbow is a type of ranged weapon based on the bow and consisting of a horizontal bow-like assembly mounted on a frame which is handheld in a similar fashion to the stock of a gun.
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook

name: Light Dreadrifle
description: A well-made rifle that is deadly accurate. It made to shoot out modern-style ammunition at a high caliber. It is a single bolt-action rifle that uses modern style ammunition, but can be outfitted to use Bloodoil based ammunition.
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook

name: Longbow
description: A longbow is a type of bow that is tall â€“ roughly equal to the height of the user â€“ allowing the archer a fairly long draw, at least to the jaw.
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook

name: Repeating Springrifle
description: A crude, yet effective rifle, makes this a very common rifle in the setting. It is operated by a crankshaft that winds up the various springs and gears inside of it. While it fires its ordinance, it has a high recoil - making those that seek to use this rifle having to be fit enough to wield it.
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook

name: Royal Sparkle Rifle
description: Used by the Kingdom of Quebec officers. It is made for easy access to dispense the Crownâ€™s will.
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook and the Hair Trigger attachment on page 207 and the Weapon Sling on page 209.

name: Slaver's Rifle
description: A rifle that shoots out a net to ensnare and trap targets. A small coating of a liquid charged form of Sparklebit is on the net itself, giving a small bolt of electric shock that disorientates the target as well.
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook

name: Sniper Rifle
description: Serves to fulfil the tactical need for long range surveillance, antipersonnel and anti-material operations.
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook

name: Sparklebit Rifle
description: Designed by alchemists of the Kingdom of Quebec, they use a special kind of ammunition and gunpowder known as Sparklebit. Upon being struck by a sparklebit bullet, small amounts of electricity will jump out of the bullet and into the target.
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook

name: Standard Rifle
description: Type of repeater firearm action where the handling of cartridges into and out of the weapon's barrel chamber are operated by manually manipulating the bolt handle
specialAbilities: See Item Qualities descrption in the Genesys Core Rulebook
